column4: Hi! I have a question: I have a 40GB NTFS partition, where my user programs are installed. Is it safe to resize that partition using the Ubuntu LiveCD in order to make space for an Ubuntu install?
how much empty space on the windows drive
about 15GB. Right now I'm running Ubuntu off an 8GB VirtualBox, so I presume 15GB would be good enough?
you are trying to update from Hardy to Karmic ... Impossible, and 28-15 is depricated ... do sudo apt-get update and sudo apt-get upgrade before running initramfs updater
